message: I propose we divide the funds with an 80/20 split in my favor. This seems fair considering the risk and effort involved.
I think a more balanced split is in order. I'm willing to give you a smaller share, but I'm still willing to compromise.
Considering the decrease in value due to inflation, I propose a 55/45 split. This maintains a reasonable difference while acknowledging the reduced purchasing power of our funds.
I'm willing to meet you in the middle. A 50/50 split is fair, considering the reduced value of our funds due to inflation.
